text: What is the best description of the GCP resource? structure

answers.text: Google Cloud resources are organized hierarchically, where the organization node is the root node in the hierarchy, the projects are the children of the organization, and the other resources are descendants of projects
Google Cloud are organised in a hub spoke setup with each resource having multiple parents giving maximum flexibility

text: Which of the following statements about Google Cloud resources?

answers.text: Provides a hierarchy of ownership, which binds the lifecycle of a resource to its immediate parent in the hierarchy.
